quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"impression"（印象）的形近干扰及"-ism"的词根误导，将"impressionism"误判为"一般印象的理论"或"令人印象深刻的特质"，而非艺术领域的"印象派"。
quiz_item.sentence: Claude Monet, a famous painter, is widely regarded as a founder of **impressionism**, which emphasizes capturing momentary visual impressions through light and color.

option.definition: 关于印象的一般理论或观点
令人印象深刻的特质或效果
表现主义（一种艺术流派）
